articles.title: TikToker rattles Bolivia's financial system
articles.summary: Juan Carlos Villafuerte, 21, was arrested for allegedly damaging the credibility of Bolivia's financial system. The Financial System Supervisory Authority (ASFI) filed a complaint against him for creating videos that claimed the banks in Bolivia are in danger and advised people to withdraw their savings. Ombudsman Pedro Callisaya condemned the state's use of punitive power and violation of freedom of expression. Attorney General Róger Mariaca said Wednesday that the young man will not be charged.
